reviewText: Fast shipping! What a great DVD! I love horses and love to watch people and horses interact with each other. This DVD does a great job of explaining how we can use horses as an example to demonstrate our relationship with God!
We were very unhappy when this DVD turned out to be defective and un-viewable and that they didn't have a replacement DVD available but our funds were reimbursed promptly and with no problem.
Came before expected, reasonable price, great product, very interesting and educational. We really enjoy Lew Sterritt and his horses as they teach life principles.
